data.title: Ricardo Garcia (Magic Master) - World Class Mastering Engineer - Rio de Janeiro
data.meta_description: World Class Mastering Engineer Ricardo Garcia (Magic Master) - Listen to samples, read reviews, learn more, contact. Read interview with Ricardo Garcia (Mag...
data.text:
Multi Grammy Award-winning Mastering Engineer with 28 years of experience in Mastering and 42 years working in the audio business.

Mastering all kinds of music with great passion all the time

Masters for: Radio, Spotify, TIDAL, Apple Digital Masters (Mastered for iTunes (MFiT) Certified), CD, Vinyl, 5.1 Surround and Restoration.

Ricardo Garcia has three nominations for Latin Grammy Best Engineering category and was the mastering engineer for fifty Latin Grammy award winning records for artists such as Gilberto Gil, Caetano Veloso, Tribalistas, Maria Rita, Roberto Carlos, Lenine, Zeca Pagodinho, Paulinho da Viola, Cassia Eller, Milton Nascimento, Alcione, Vanessa da Mata, Aline Barros…

Ricardo has also been the mastering engineer for 3 Grammy winners in the World Music category for João Gilberto, Milton Nascimento and Gilberto Gil.

In short:

More Than 50 Latin Grammy album winners

3 Best Sound Engineering Latin Grammy Nominations

3 World Music Grammy Album winners

Ricardo has the same dedication to independent artists as he does to major labels.

Each song is a piece of art and has to be treated like it is the best one.

Tell me about your project and how I can help, through the 'Contact' button above.
